key.name: custom-theme
key.description: If disabled, then the application will use the integrated Theme from the Kosy Project. Otherwise the one specified in custom-theme-path.

key.name: custom-theme-path
key.description: Absolute path to the css file which should be used for styling.

key.name: allow-shutdown
key.description: Allows the user to shutdown the system from the lock screen. This can lead to data loss.

key.name: background-image
key.summary: Path to the background image to be shown
key.description: Absolute path to the background image. Image should have fitting resolution and will only be streched. Empty means default.
